flag.name: wxCLRP_USE_TEXTCTRL
flag.description: Creates a text control to the left of the picker button which is completely managed by the wxColourPickerCtrl and which can be used by the user to specify a colour (see SetColour). The text control is automatically synchronized with button's value. Use functions defined in wxPickerBase to modify the text control.

flag.name: wxCLRP_SHOW_LABEL
flag.description: Shows the colour in HTML form (AABBCC) as colour button label (instead of no label at all).

colour.name: value
colour.description: Initial value of the control (default: wxBLACK).

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_COLOURPICKER_CHANGED
type.description: The user changed the colour selected in the control either using the button or using text control (see wxCLRP_USE_TEXTCTRL; note that in this case the event is fired only if the userâ€™s input is valid, i.e. recognizable).
